page.title: 13Shopping-Armitage/Handsacre
page.content: {SHOPS} In Armitage with Handsacre there are not as many shops as people want. The main shops are food and general of which we have four. There are two clothing shops. There are services that come into the area. There are two mobile grocers called Masons and Shoparound, a Fish and Chip van, a Fish van and a Barbers van. The other shop that is wanted by the public is a Chemist. {SOME PRICES} ITEM QUANTITY PRICE Bran Flakes 500gms 69p Sugar 1 kg 46p Black Treacle 680gms 52p Custard Powder 312gms 33p Apples 454gms 30p Milk 1 pt 23p Baked Beans 450gms 23p Salad Cream 285gms 47p Weetabix 24 pk 65p
